tag_list: dazzboard, social-networks, portable-devices, computers, pcs, music, photo, video
overview:
Prior to dazzboard, Tero co-founded SecuryCast, the leading Finnish Digital service provider for online and mobile content. At SecuryCast, he was initially responsible for mobile integration and partnering, and later went on to manage application portfolios in Scandinavia, primarily for mobile music. Earlier in his career, Tero started, built and sold his first company, the mobile service provider Dialtone ltd, in Finland. He has extensive global experience in mobile and online value-added services and content distribution, with services leveraged throughout the world. Tero holds a MS in Business Administration from the University of Tampere.

SOURCE: <a href="http://dazzboard.com">Dazzboard</a>
